website_summaries.verdict: A serious mask capable of protection for major tasks and professional jobs that require extra precautions, but it's not practical or comfortable for most consumers.
pros: Made by a trusted name in the industry
Reusable, adjustable mask that accommodates replaceable filters
Meant for work around major dust, contaminants, and pollutants
Comes in a variety of sizes
cons: Design is a bit bulky, yet runs somewhat small
Not meant for basic dust protection

customer_reviews.title: Let me tell you a story from the before time...
customer_reviews.text: Long ago there was a traveling merchant named Jeff Big Man Amazon. For the right price, I was given these masks and delivered from the apocalypse. I had originally sought these masks for an ancient war ritual known as "roof work", the details of which have long since been lost to time. Thank you Jeff, Lord of Warehouses, for saving us. But no for real, great product, with the right filters this actually can keep you safe right now BUT PLEASE DO YOUR OWN RESEARCH DON"T TRUST ME I'M A DUDE LARPING MAD MAX AMID A HEALTH CRISIS. Please be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Mail to a dear friend in China w/ N95 filters
customer_reviews.text: As a former DOD Aircraft Mechanic, I used a respirator these for years. This respirator saved my health and possible my life, I worked in a toxic air environment with cancer causing partials in the air. Part of a complete set - respirator, and retainer w/ N95 filters
customer_reviews.author: Jusbcaus LLC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you buy/own actual needed filter part
customer_reviews.text: While it seemed good it is not all that you need to buy. For me I wanted my money since I don’t have the money to buy the actual filters you need to make this product useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime member

customer_reviews.title: A healthier choice for spray paint and wood working
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought one sooner. For years, I used the disposable dust masks for spray paint or varnishes and using a table saw. Really, they did not offer much protection but were just cheap. This mask with the right cartridges actually filters harmful vapor and micro particles. I no longer get solvent headaches or see paint and dust when I blow my nose. If the goal is to protect your health, this is a far better choice than disposable dust masks.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for a pretty good price...
customer_reviews.text: I used these masks for several purposes. Although they aren’t the full cover in a pinch they will do. I had a spray painting project in an enclosed space and this respirator worked well. I didn’t feel nauseated after spraying the room and although it does get warm, the mask stayed put and was generally pretty great. I paired these with the 60923 and although I needed better goggles I was able to finish the job. I also use these for sanding. I tend to refinish metal objects and have to use an orbital sander. This unit worked perfect using the same filters.
customer_reviews.author: Iconpyro

customer_reviews.title: The fit is amazing, doesn't let any air through the sides at ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll never do woodworking without one of these now. The fit is amazing, doesn't let any air through the sides at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Looks funny at the grocery.
customer_reviews.text: Loving my P100 mask. All these losers wearing N95. Haaa. Does this mask make me look fat?
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this model for a coupe of decades now and bought a second one for my brother to use when he helps with property management/land scape abatement using toxic ag chemicals/fertilizer. You will need to buy appropriate filter cartridges, this is a bare mask. I ordered the flat pink disk type P100's for particulates and VOC's . Also have full Tyvek cover suit and sealing googles so I look total Ghost Buster when field spraying. I your gonna be using nasty stuff for work, work safely my friends ! DB
customer_reviews.author: D.B. Kracker

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask mainly for woodworking (got with it the 2071 particle filters). It was very easy to adjust the first time I used it. I have a big head and didn't have any troubles with this mask. easy and fast to put on and take off. I have a beard, so the sealing was almost 100%. This is fine for my usage, but if, in the future, I'll want to use it for toxic vapors, I'll shave my beard or buy more suitable one. Overall, great mask!
customer_reviews.author: Edi V

customer_reviews.title: Came used with scuff marks in open bag
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Product came in open ziploc bag and product has scuff marks all over it clearly indicating this is a USED PRODUCT THEY ARE SELLING AS NEW. BUYER BEWARE. Pictures are the best I could take as lighting hides scuff marks with this phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Issues putting on the filters
customer_reviews.text: The mask fit fine, my issue was putting on the filters on it. I put on one side without issues but by the time I put on the second filter I ran into some trouble. I guess I didn't press hard enough against the mask and the little plastic tab that's supposed to hold the filter in place got flattened and now the filter is not airtight and it will never be. I blame myself for maybe not pressing hard agains the seal while turning the filter, but I also didn't forced it to the point that basically rendered the mask unusable....
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo F. Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Great for welding.
customer_reviews.text: Great for welding. I've tried the Smaller respirators made to fit under the welding mask and the smell from stick welding just flows right through them. With this mask and the 3M 2097 P100 filters, I don't smell the welding fumes at all. Fitment is slightly snug under my mask but the protection is well worth it. I still can weld perfectly fine and I find the mask blocks out the flash coming in from under the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Saabaru80Ate

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy breathing. Be sure to buy the right filters.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy breathing. Be sure to buy the right filters. This mask is even more comfortable than the thin blue surgical masks because it has an upper strap that goes on the rear-top of your head (like where the hair swirl is) and another one that is secured behind your neck. Fully adjustable and I really like that you can "unhook" the lower strap to make it easier to slip off. I've been using HEPA-like 3M filters (the round, purple ones) with it and there is some effort with breathing, but 3M makes multiple less-restrictive filters so you can balance higher risk vs. easier breathing as you see fit.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: 3M always comes through
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great fit, and snug seal around the face without being uncomfortable. 3M is the only facepiece that I ever purchase after many failed attempts otherwise. I use a medium size, and would suggest that for most people thinking they'll need a large (except for very large-faced folks). This does not come with filter cartridges, so be sure to buy those along with this or it will look spiffy and protect you from nothing. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Tera W.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, 3M
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at the performance of this product system. I'm using this mask with 3M Multi Gas/Vapor Cartridges #6006. I have been down in an in-ground pool acid washing the plaster with, at times, full-strength miuratic acid. I can't smell even a whiff of the acid vapors. The mask itself is fexible in a way that offers a custom fit for my face. It's so comfortable to wear. The neck strap and head strap are well designed and easily adjusted for a perfect fit. I can't believe that this mask is so affordable for the performance and comfort it provides. A home run product.
customer_reviews.author: ememen

customer_reviews.title: package opened and no filter included, USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this unless you have the filters. Doesn't even come with 1 set of filters. I ordered multiple and all of the packages were opened as if they removed the filters!
customer_reviews.author: Crisy

customer_reviews.title: Protection is a must! And this product does it well.....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit lightweight I wish it came with the filters, that's what I thought when I bought it, but it did not, so I had to wait to use it until the filters came but when it did it was a nice fit........
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and flimsy straps
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly uncomfortable and cheaply made. The straps and clasps are very flimsy. I can’t believe they will last very long. When I look down the weight of the mask presses into my nose quite painfully. It better filter out fumes or it will be a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: C. Day

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Friday and got it Wednesday. I got the medium and it fits my face perfectly. I'm short (5'4") and have a small head but sure am glad I did not purchase the smaller size. This seals right to the top of my nose bridge and seals at the chin. Product seems to work. slightly disappointed that this does not fit under my welding hood when fitted with the gas filters. It will with the small particulate filters though, so it's not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just OK half-mask
customer_reviews.text: It fits. It seals if you tighten the straps enough. Nowhere near as comfortable as the 3M 7502/37082(AAD) - that one is silicone and well worth the extra money. Should have read the product description more carefully...
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Great in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I use it whenever I need to be indoors along with other people (say DMV etc), peace of mind, it's even more comfortable than mask! No issues whatsoever, people are fine with that. Contra: Buyers beware, I heard some airlines prohibit those onboard because of lack of exhale filtering, which kind of makes sense but also doesn't. Warning: You need to buy filters separately to use it!
customer_reviews.author: GuyFromSanJose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Effective, very lightly constructed - not built to last wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery from Amazon; good design and effective for the purpose of filtration. The only concern is that it is built with the lowest tolerances for wear and tear, employing cheap materials so thinly molded that I am sure they will not last much use. Would like them to have made this a bit more durable; then I would have been perfectly happy. Like so many reviews on Amazon: "You get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dryak

customer_reviews.title: It works to keep the fragrances & smoke from other people out so that I don't get migraines.
customer_reviews.text: It's really more than I wanted but it definitely works. I wear it to all doctor appts. I don't end up with a migraine every time I'm out in public. I'm basically allergic to people. I also get migraines from the smoke from neighbors fireplace or grill use. I can't even walk out my back door there's so much smoke in the air at times.
customer_reviews.author: Cairnz

customer_reviews.title: Ok but doesn't seal great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seal all the way because the mask i got was bent around the nose peace and i can't get it to bend back so I have to keep moving it around till I can't tell the air getting out
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It is somewhat comfortable, that is why I only gave it a ...
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I are currently renovating our kitchen cabinets. Lots of staining and varnishing to be completed. I purchased this 3m half facepiece reusable respirator mask to use during the process. I don't notice any smell now when I am working on the cabinets. It is somewhat comfortable, that is why I only gave it a 4. My spouse has the same mask and his is much more comfortable than mine. I believe the reason being is his is "broke in"....He has had his for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: mare

customer_reviews.title: Good respirator
customer_reviews.text: Have used these masked for years in hazardous environments. 3M makes good quality respirators. This particular mask was purchased for woodworking (sanding, sawing, etc) and paired with a 3M p100 cartridge with organic vapor protection. Useful while using wood finishes with solvents. One star knocked down for comfort. Half face respirators all seem to suffer from the same fault.. excessive pressure on the neck and nose leading to discomfort after long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, this ia a one time use item, does not come with filter needed. Walmart has a better product and it come with filter. Plastic is cheep and very thin. It says 3M not sure if 3M knows they are using their name. Not made in US. Also you have the added fun of no way to track because it's not being shipped in the US. Thanks again amazon
customer_reviews.author: allenyk2000

customer_reviews.title: Form fitting, comfortable, and light.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting mask that is simple to don and doff. Reminds me of my oxygen mask facecup as a military pilot without all the custom prefit beforehand. Used this in a high concentration of fine particulates like cutting concrete, stone, steel sheeting, and gypsum, without anything coming through the P100 filter (2097 beat 2091 just because I could no longer smell the stone or metal). It was very pleasing at the end of long hours grinding away with only condensation in the mask. The condensatiin is a nice bacterial breeding ground but the mask cleans very well after removing filters with soap and water followed by an alcohol pad when it dries. Bought again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy rubber/plastic and straps easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: worked well with the 3M P100 fillters reusable respirator to block out tons of dust. If you have breathing issues or are adverse to smells, this definitely does the trick. Despite going over the prescribed #hours the filters were rated to work, it kept going all week under adverse conditions. I've already bought more ahead of my next project.... you will need to wipe down the respirator but it's durable enough to last a while. Good sturdy rubber/plastic and straps easily adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Great respirator for wood working
customer_reviews.text: I used the respirator while sanding (with orbital sander) our outdoor furniture. The mask was comfortable and effective in keeping dust particles from being inhaled. Excellent product. Would buy it again and recommend purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: I didn't die from allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my laboratory because I had been having reactions to dust from bran meal and ammonia in a mealworm colony. When I would clean the container, I would get a severe asthma attack. This respirator has made it possible for me to clean cages.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Muskopf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, a life-saver for those with asthma/allergies
customer_reviews.text: This respirator fits well, comfortable, no hard edges or rubbing, and it doesn't interfere with my eyeglasses, hair, or jewelry. More importantly, wearing this respirator with the organic vapor cartridges protects me from asthmatic attacks that were triggered by odors from makeup & perfumes, dry cleaning, paint, yard treatment chemicals, formaldehyde off-gassing, cleaning agents, certain plants, and more. At times I feel conspicuous wearing it--although I do appreciate its low profile--but it protects my breathing & health and has enabled me to go into more places safely. I can also attest to its durability: I had a prior version of this respirator and it lasted 10 years before pieces began wearing out (the elastic, the soft silicone nose piece).
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask. Don’t skimp on safety equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, I am sanding down an old humvee which has Carc paint. Since Carc causes cancer, I am using this with some 3m filters. I marked 4 stars for comfort but this is the basic model so it’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Penny

customer_reviews.title: Seemed used. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Came in open ziplock bag. Bag was also damaged. No filters or cartridge as indicated on older reviews. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Naffy

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Safe
customer_reviews.text: Gives me peace of mind knowing this respirator is doing its job correctly. I wear these all the time and I love this type. Fits perfect and is comfortable. Recommend using this while working with fumes, chemicals, and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Bragg

customer_reviews.title: This Half Face Mask Can Have Filters Changed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mask which is easy to fit and wear. It is made to have replacement filters. This makes it easy to have additional filters on hand if needed. If you have multiple masks having the ability to replace filters is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Very Breatheable and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised at how comfortable and breatheable this thing is. With the pads attached, it felt like I was breathing fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Amiyah Natural Products

customer_reviews.title: might be used
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. Mine came in super dusty, not just the plastic package but also the product itself. It might be used.
customer_reviews.author: yull0123

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting and seal well
customer_reviews.text: Good fit based on sizing. Seals well and straps hold it in place good. Mask is constructed of high quality material and should last for an extended time. Filters mount up perfectly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Blayne Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It does not cover and seal. It is med. Adult but leaves big areas uncovered at top and bottom! Is not as pictured flimsy and not what I expected for 40 some dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra r

customer_reviews.title: Excellent respirator
customer_reviews.text: Night and day compared to cloth masks. This one really filters out all particles and it's also comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buenfil

customer_reviews.title: 3M Is Good To Me
customer_reviews.text: Love it. If I was allowed to wear a gas mask when I was formally trained in the Southern California prison system, I would have cherished one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for keeping yourself safe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortably fits my head and creates a good seal around my nose and mouth. I use this primarily for wood working but sometimes when I'm cleaning something using chemicals. It's more expensive than other options out there but I value my life above the $10 savings. Could also be used for a good Walter White or crappy Bane costume.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gyulie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Im 6' 170 lbs, the medium size fits perfect. Im asian so I had concerns about its ability to form a seal on my face but its not an issue. Its easy to clean and the adjustable straps keeps the mask put.
customer_reviews.author: HybridHB

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive masks
customer_reviews.text: I have three sets of these for different tasks. They are cheap enough to buy multiple masks rather than frequently changing the cartridges based on what I need. Overall, they are quite comfortable and I've stopped using the disposable masks all together. They do get warmer and uncomfortable if used outdoors in the sun, but are great in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I love these Respirators
customer_reviews.text: I love these Respirators! I bought this & a 2 pair filter pack. Both came in the knick of time before a project. My lungs are for sure happy. I would suggest getting this mask directly from 3M vs the other listing that may seem like it comes w/ a pair of filters. A few reviews stated that they only received the mask. This one is $4 cheaper. Put that towards getting filters & you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ray.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good mask. Fit is decent but could be an issue for some. I have an average size nose and it can sometimes take a minute or two to get adjusted properly for comfort. Works way better than a disposable mask with appropriate cartridges for your application. It does sweat on the inside but of course you're breathing into it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Protz

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy the filters separate. The mask is easy to put on yourself and is pretty comfortable for a mask. I do recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: lovemyamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for lasering and the fumes from acrylic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, light weight. Great for use with a laser setup. Even with air flow vented outdoors the garage had a high smell when lasering acrylic. With this mask, no smell at all. I can wait for the smell in the garage to dissipate fully and then take the mask off.
customer_reviews.author: JEWON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get a good fit, and easy to change the filters ,and it's affordable. I use my mask primarily at the indoor shooting range. They claim to have state of the art ventilation, and I don't doubt them, but lead collects on all of the surfaces that I contact while inside the range, as well as collecting on my clothing. I wash my hands and exposed face areas before leaving for home, and I throw my clothes in the laundry as soon as I get home. I wish I had this mask when I was scraping the popcorn ceiling off in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Graham

customer_reviews.title: works for price, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: works for price, works as expected slightly uncomfortable after an hr, but minor compliant
customer_reviews.author: krusty

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband has only used 2 other respirators in the last 10 years. He does drywall and uses the mask for drywall dust when he's sanding. He was happy he decided to get this one instead of a more expensive mask as this works just fine. I would have included a picture but he started using it the day he got it so it's on the job site. A size medium fit his face okay abs he could have maybe gone up to a large but not down to a small. He's about average size at 5'6 and 150lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Larson

customer_reviews.title: Decent respirator
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty happy with this respirator. I just wish it had a bit snug or fit between the sides of my nose and cheeks. I do get some slight leakage if I’m not very Careful win first putting it on. Could be a better fit there
customer_reviews.author: A. Pico

customer_reviews.title: good design
customer_reviews.text: Seals to the face well. Good weight balance, even with the heavier dual purpose cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware....
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this is a garbage buy. Came used and in an open ziploc bag. Filter was not included. Usually a filter would be included on a new buy. If you're OK with the product being misrepresented, proceed with buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: very good, little small
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Works perfectly with 3M filters. Just one isssue is, it appears to be slightly smaller than expected. I bought medium, but it feels like small.
customer_reviews.author: Bike lover

customer_reviews.title: essential to protect your lungs!!
customer_reviews.text: have used this half face mask with vapor/particulate filter cartridges for years. indispensable for working around dusty environs, working with chemicals etc. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I use it for firing pottery
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and easy to connect filters. I find that all masks hurt my nose, and this one is no different. It is not terrible, and I think it is due in part to my nose. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: AChefsGarden

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Mask itself smells awful plastic and rubber. I need a mask to wear the mask. After about 4 months it no longer smells but I haven't used it since if you do wear a mask underneath then it makes this weird sound when you breath and is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: 10000% better than disposables
customer_reviews.text: These masks are just such an upgrade over the plain disposable type, the cartridges last a long time and you can get the right cartridge for your needs so If you do anything that creates dust or vapor, do it and protect yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Daine P

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGE CAME OPEN
customer_reviews.text: Package came open. Mask doesn't look in bad condition, but bag being open is very alarming, especially with the whole pandemic going on.
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for doing my own spray-foam insulation. Durable enough, easy to adjust and put on and off. These are the cartridges I used with it -
customer_reviews.author: dbmac

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Wow, they are making these smaller and lighter as the years have passed. Works well. I have a normal adult male face and the medium works or fits perfectly. Straps and clasps do look like they are the things that might fail in the long run, but we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: hesty24

customer_reviews.title: Order filters if using while sanding wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice this mask does not come with 2 filters.
customer_reviews.author: b21cross

customer_reviews.title: Amazing respirator.
customer_reviews.text: I got two to these to wear during the construction of my home, since I am doing both the siding and painting. It's pretty amazing at how well it filters dust and fumes. My husband wore it once while spraying bleach and didn't realize how well it was working until he took it off and realized that the bleach smell was overpowering - he couldn't smell it at all while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Goot Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and high price but ok and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sango in DFW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Respirator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Filters are cheap. Multiple types available. Make sure that you understand what your mask size is. Without a proper fitting respirator the filters don’t matter. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: justuff

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: got a medium was uncomfortably small mostly my fault though for not knowing which size fit me. maybe i just got a big head.....
customer_reviews.author: gee

customer_reviews.title: Kept out the bleach odor.
customer_reviews.text: Used this with 3M filters to clean mold and mildew. Kept out the bleach base odor and made cleaning easy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like it but it has started cracking on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: like it but it has started cracking on the inside valve trims, mostly cosmetic but still, only used a few time and i clean it very thoroughly. like, don't love it. does what I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: blkaja

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't quite as comfortable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite as comfortable as I expected, and was a bit smaller than I thought it would be as well. Okay for short term use. Works great besides comfort issues. Might be resolved if I got the next larger size. But they do make a more comfortable, longer term use version as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zentastic

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to wear while vaporizing oxalic acid for bees
customer_reviews.text: comfortable to wear while vaporizing oxalic acid for bees. Does get a little sweaty in the heat, but what sealed plastic strapped to your face wouldn't?
customer_reviews.author: gumby

customer_reviews.title: Much, much better than the disposable over-the-ears 90% masks
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and great price. Much, much better than the disposable over-the-ears 90% masks. Used this in the attic working with installing fiberglass insulation, and also pulling up old carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Neumiller

customer_reviews.title: Good job on the comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask. They've come a long way in mask design and comfort since my previous life of having to wear air-purifying masks for work. I use this with a combo filter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just have to get the right filters for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Looks promising , fits perfectly in your face with good construction material
customer_reviews.author: Tech55

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very average mask, it’s a little harder to breath in this one compared to other ones I have used. Also makes a some noise when you breath.
customer_reviews.author: BN Symons

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I used my old 3M respirator often for years. Eventually the plastic head band became brittle and kept breaking no matter how often I super glued it. I hope this one lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Works like intended.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for woodworking. I like the fit. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: KAP-C

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but it is only the mask and does not come with the filter but it is still worth it for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Jennifer Gozum

customer_reviews.title: Effective filter!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and effective in filtering rock wool carcinogenic particles! We've been so pleased with rock wool to insulate but you never want to be in the attic without this filter on.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mack

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, extremely comfortable and great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, extremely comfortable and does the job well. Great value. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DonH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. It does exactly what it's advertised to do. It has kept dust and insulation out of my lungs and done it while I stayed cool and comfortable. I'm unable to conceive of anything about this product I can complain about giving it 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Sublimefly

customer_reviews.title: This is a classic
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with this mask. Just add cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: john abild

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my older Aosafety filter was bad. I couldn't find the parts in the local stores and I didn't want to have problems finding filters so I bought this 3M respirator. Good fit and the air flow gives me no problems. When I block the airway, it seems like a good seal. I purchased a gas and dust filter along with it. I also like that fact that I can go to my Home Depot or Lowe's and get the filter if I'm out and can't wait for a shipment.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oh

customer_reviews.title: Works Like it Should
customer_reviews.text: Use for OAV treatments for varroa mites. Works likes it should.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the customer have all the item
customer_reviews.text: the masked was perfect but it's missing some few items to complete the mask
customer_reviews.author: Christian vargas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for staining wood. (Doesn’t come with the pads) it’s very comfy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Shunk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used several times for different projects (pest control spraying, cleaning, spray painting etc.). Very happy and confident when using this respirator.
customer_reviews.author: Mary of Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Nice 3M Product
customer_reviews.text: Great respirator for the price. I use it in the shop all the time. It's adjustable straps provide a comfortable and/or tighter fit depending upon your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for home improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the garage remodel and repair the wooden deck. comfortable enough for around 2-3 hours continuous use. had to take it off to wipe the sweat off haha. would be nice it could add a filter or something on the exhale port.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Breath
customer_reviews.text: Fits me just fine. Works great when im grinding. No black particles in my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for painting
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for painting! I can't even smell the paint when I have it on. I bought it with the 3M 6001PB1-1 Organic Vapor Replacement Cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with filters
customer_reviews.text: I thought it come with basic filters, which is not. After checked filters cost and find out actually is more expensive than the mask, a little sad.
customer_reviews.author: joonie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Using it while "fogging" the yard. Fits very well, although your glasses will need to ride higher up on your nose. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Psorcon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I replaced one that i had used for 10 years. I wear it ( plus filter) for all kinds of home renovation projects. Much more effective and comfortable than disposable paper filter.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Beaches

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Solid 3M choice. I can wear for hours and not get uncomfortable. Super light weight and comfortable but still rugged. Goes on and off faster than a dust mask. Great seal to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good respirator.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for spraying varnish top coats. Comfortable, easy to use. Changing filters is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haynes

customer_reviews.title: The packing is opened and the mask are dusty.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure whether it's new or used. It's totally unzipped, wide open, with dust.
customer_reviews.author: Primus

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I do spray paint art, and needed a good respirator. This one is great. It's comfortable, and the medium fits my face snuggly. (I'm an average sized woman.) I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Mularz

product_meta.title: 3M Half Facepiece Reusable Respirator 6200, Gases, Vapors, Dust, Paint, Cleaning, Grinding, Sawing, Sanding, Welding, Medium
feature_bullets: Comfortable: Soft, Lightweight Face Piece With Easy to Adjust Head Straps for a Customized Fit
Durable and Reusable: Respirator Can Be Disassembled, Cleaned, and Reused; Supplied With Reclosable Storage Bag
Helps Reduce Exposure to Particulates and a Wide Variety of Gases and Vapors When Used With Approved Cartridges and Filters
Use With Other Ppe: Adjustment Points Located on Face Piece for Improved Compatibility With Other Personal Protection Equipment
Applications: Chemical Handling, Chipping, Chiseling, Cleaning, Grinding, Machining, Masonry, Painting, Sanding, Sawing, Welding, Construction, General Manufacturing, Industrial Maintenance
Compatible: Bayonet Connection Is Compatible With All 3M Bayonet Style Cartridges and Filters
NIOSH approved for negative pressure air purifying and supplied air dual airline applications
For industrial/occupational use only; Not for consumer sale or use
